package nov19;

public class OMRKing {
	void BMW520(){
		System.out.println("King Car");
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		People1 r = new People1();
		r.bike();
		System.out.println(r.name_people1);
		OMRKing king = new
				OMRKing();
		king.BMW520();
		}

}
class People1{
	String name_people1 = "Robin";
	void car(){
		System.out.println("People1 Car");
	}
	void bike(){
		System.out.println("People1 Bike");
	}
}
class People2{
	String name_people1 = "Ted";
	void car(){
		System.out.println("People2 Car");
	}
}
